sources.title: Frontier Marshal (1939)
sources.description: Wyatt Earp agrees to become marshal and establish order in Tombstone in this very romanticized version of the gunfight at the O.K. Corral. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/frontier-marshal-1939/

metadata.Plot: Early low budget version of the famous Gunfight at OK Corral with Scott as Wyatt Earp and Romero as Doc Holiday. Remade by John Ford as "My Darling Clementine" in 1946 and by John Sturges as "Gunfight at OK Corral" in 1957
metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Nancy Kelly, Cesar Romero
